com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceAnnotators

Class TextReplacement

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceAnnotators.TextReplacement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class TextReplacement
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A marker to be used inside an annotation, indicating that the annotated section should be replaced by another text for analysis purposes.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli
    See Also:
